blockers.description: Held-out set N=58 belum dipromosikan dari klaim 82. Evidence: data/benchmark_manifest.json line 22: declared_total_cases 82 vs actual 24.
LLM-mode parity belum terverifikasi. Evidence: results_post_patch_n24_offline_2026-02-09.json hanya offline mode.

votes.rationale: Validitas rendah tanpa held-out; fatal risk #1 (premature submission) aktif.
Viable fallback tapi mengorbangkan kontribusi arsitektur; gunakan sebagai B1 dalam dual-track.
Best risk-adjusted return; stabilisasi B0 + eksplorasi B1/B2; mengurangi fatal risk #1 dengan tetap menghasilkan bukti perbandingan.
Too conservative; stagnasi tanpa progress evaluatif; deadline risk tinggi.

notes: NORMALIZATION NOTE: Original Kimi ballot had fractional scores (2.75/3.75/4.0/3.0) rounded to nearest integer (3/4/4/3). Key positions preserved: P1=reject, P2=abstain, P3=approve, P4=reject. Kimi is the ONLY agent to reject P4 (views pure infra-freeze as too conservative/stagnating). Prior normalization had incorrectly altered P1 reject→abstain, P2 abstain→approve, P4 reject→approve, and downgraded 3 HIGH blockers to 2 MEDIUM — all restored to original.
